Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sprite
      • Moveable
        • Enemy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Direction
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Mage, Rogue, Skeleton

    public abstract class Enemy
extends Moveable
    This class represents an enemy. If the player comes into contact with an enemy, the level restarts. Enemies can also move.
